# Instructions

## Sticky rice (I)

1.  Wash sticky (glutinous) rice until water runs clear.
2.  Soak sticky rice in water in fridge overnight.

## Sticky rice (II)

1.  Drain water.
2.  Wrap in cheese cloth.
3.  Steam for 20 minutes.

## Sticky rice marinade

1.  Mix all ingredients in saucepan and bring to a boil.
2.  Remove from heat.

## Sticky rice (III)

1.  Remove sticky rice from cheese cloth, place in bowl, add sticky rice marinade, and stir.
2.  Cover for 20 minutes.
3.  Stir again.
4.  Press/mold the sticky rice into a ball. Cover for 20 minutes.

## Sticky rice sauce

1.  Mix all ingredients in saucepan and bring to a boil.
2.  Stir until thickened.

## Sticky rice garnish

1.  Toast sesame seeds in saucepan.

## Serving

1.  Plate sticky rice and mango.
2.  Pour sticky rice sauce on sticky rice.
3.  Garnish sticky rice with sesame seeds.
